elements.title: Welcome to the Now and Later Game
elements.text: In this game you will choose between getting different numbers of hours off work/school to do whatever you want  either right now, or in six months. While you will not receive the actual time-off, please make your decisions as if you were really going to receive the time-off for leisure. 8 hours equals about one day off. There are no correct or incorrect choices.

parameters.prompt: Please choose which amounts of time you would like off either right NOW or in SIX MONTHS.

elements.title: Thank you for completing the task!
